hotels.name: Diani Reef
hotels.description: A luxurious 5-star resort located on the beautiful Diani Beach, offering stunning views and top-notch amenities.

hotels.name: Leisure Lodge Golf Resort
hotels.description: A 4-star resort situated on the beach, offering comfortable rooms, a golf course, and a range of recreational activities.

hotels.name: Sarova Whitesands Resort
hotels.description: A 5-star resort offering luxurious accommodations, multiple dining options, and a variety of activities on Bamburi Beach.

hotels.name: English Point Marina
hotels.description: A luxury hotel located on the waterfront, featuring a marina and various recreational activities.

hotels.name: Serena Beach Resort & Spa
hotels.description: A 5-star resort with luxurious rooms, multiple dining options, and beachside activities.

hotels.name: Sunset Hotel Kisumu
hotels.description: A 3-star resort offering comfortable accommodations and a relaxed atmosphere near the beach.

safaris.name: Maasai Mara Adventure
safaris.description: Experience the thrill of a safari in one of the world's most famous wildlife reserves, known for the Great Migration and rich biodiversity.

safaris.name: Serengeti Exploration
safaris.description: Explore the vast plains of the Serengeti, home to lions, elephants, and the annual wildebeest migration.

safaris.name: Tsavo Safari
safaris.description: A safari adventure in Tsavo National Park, a vast wilderness reserve in Kenya. Explore the diverse ecosystems, encounter iconic wildlife like elephants, lions, and cheetahs, and witness the stunning landscapes.

safaris.name: Diani Beach Getaway
safaris.description: Relax on the stunning Diani Beach while enjoying various water sports and beach activities. Perfect for families and adventure seekers alike.
